title: XRP jumps 8% after Ripple’s CEO says SEC has dropped its case against the crypto currency
description: BANGKOK (AP) — The price of XRP jumped more than 8% Thursday after the CEO of cryptocurrency company Ripple said U.S. regulators have dropped its four-year-old case against the company. The Securities and Exchange Commission sued Ripple and two of its executives in late 2020 after they raised $1.4 billion by selling XRP crypto coins. […]

title: LG’s NFT marketplace for TVs is shutting down
description: LG is shutting down Art Lab, its NFT marketplace for TVs. In a notice posted to its website, LG says it has made the “difficult decision” to close the platform on June 17th.LG launched its Art Lab app during the NFT craze in 2022, billing it as a way to “buy, sell and enjoy high-quality digital artwork” from your TV. It added new digital art to the platform through “groundbreaking” NFT drops, which users could purchase by scanning a QR code to complete transactions through Wallypto, LG’s crypto wallet app.At launch, LG Art Lab operated on the Hedera network, which used a...

title: Sound Engineer for Eminem Stole and Sold His Songs for Bitcoin, U.S. Says
description: About 25 unreleased songs by the rapper were discovered online, and investigators traced sales of the music to a former employee, according to federal prosecutors.

title: The Crypto Bars are Invading Washington
